init

public void init(exHashtable info)
the lobby initializes games it is about to start by calling this function. Each client will separately execute initialization with similar parameters, which will cause the clients to all connect to the server to form an active game.

Overrides:
init in class commonPanel
See Also:
PLAYERS_IN_GAME, NUMBER_OF_PLAYER_CONNECTIONS, SCORING_MODE, RANDOMSEED, GAMETYPEID
